pr_title: DB-9048 Support all types for create/alter table with default

timeline.message: DB-9048 Support all types for create/alter table with default

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to create it with maximumWidth instead of 0?
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: We mimic what DB2 is doing. For char(n) for bit data, their default is a byte array of size n, filled with 0x0
replies.author: arnaud-splice
